Nyota Uhura,Dr. Leonard McCoy [Bones],unidentified Proxima Centaurians,Isis,Lt. Arex,Lt. Montgomery Scott [Scotty],Caylx Wairata (Proxima Centaurian),Lt. Hikaru Sulu
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:01:20 [Issue ID 4000-828826] urn:comicvine:4000-828826 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:47:38. [Issue ID 2210521]
ComicInfo.Summary: On the Death of a Friend [Part 2]: While a quarantined Dr. McCoy races to find a cure for the virus infecting the Proxima Centaurians and himself, Chekov and Sulu discover that Isis is behind the plague and battle to stop her from killing the crew of the Enterprise.
ComicInfo.Tags: Nyota Uhura,James T. Kirk,Starfleet,Montgomery Scott,Hikaru Sulu,Arex,Enterprise Crew,Isis,Christine Chapel,Spock,Leonard McCoy,Pavel Chekov
ComicInfo.Title: On the Death of a Friend [Part 2]
